Description
Management of file indices.
Keywords
files, file index, indices

Class 'fileIndex'

Description
Manages a single files index. Entries are the tcl files encountered during the scan of the directory hierarchy.
Superclasses
azIndex
Methods
public
clear ()
fileIndex ()
getRef (name)
writeProblemPage ()

Methods

clear ()
Overrides azIndex:clear
Resets state information

fileIndex ()
Constructor, parameterizes the baseclass.

getRef (name)
Overrides azIndex:getRef
Override of baseclass functionality (indexBase:getRef). A file not in the index is searched relative to the basedir of the distribution and not marked as error (if it exists.)
Argument: name The name of the file searched by the caller.

writeProblemPage ()
Writes a page containing references to the detailed problem descriptions of files having such.
